entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
